'''23w51b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on December 18, 2023,<ref>{{snap|23w51b|id=a|December 18, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a crash bug. This is the final snapshot released in 2023.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=23w51b|otherissuescount=1}}
* Fixed a crash that would occur when the name tag of a player was visible while sleeping, swimming, or dying.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* Along with [[23w51a]], this snapshot was released on the latest calendar date of all snapshots, on December 18, beating [[15w51a]] and [[15w51b]] which were released on December 17.
